replies.body:
Bet your not complaining about the retarded enemy teams that you had to face in your promos though...

Both teams get trolls, afks, bad players. It evens out. No point crying about it.

1/5, them 1 you 4, every game, past like 8 bot jinx ranges at their supp and just feeds the vayne/draven over and over, cant they suck it up and mute each other and stop making same mistake every time they walk to lane -.-

When you have won your series and move up the people in your new series are most likely stuck there and RIOT pretty much has it set if you're good enough to move up your good enough to carry your team. So they put you with retards and you usually fail and start to go downhill. 

My suggestion to you is to play 5's ranked with mates or apply for team, it's much easier to get out of bronze, silver and gold and you won't be playing with retards.

If you prefer solo queue try doing these easy steps in a game
1. Upgrade your trinket
2. Ward (Buy pinks/have a pink on the map most of the game)
3. Learn more champions
4. Don't just play a champion because your good at her/him also play a champion to suit your team comp (in solo queue that might be a little hard)
5. Communicate a lot
